simply speaking all hypopthesis testing is based on the fact that H0 is true. and we are in attempt to reject the null hypothesis.

generally h0 always assumes that the mean or any parameter tested is the 'desired' constant, and any althernative hypopthesis n1 is either not the constant, bigger or smaller than it

h0: u = 15
h1a: u=/=15
h1b: u<15
h1c: u>15

we always assume h0 is true. base on the hypothesis of h0, we would do a estimation of the population mean and sd. we try to use that estimated mean and sd to test against the sample. if the sample deviates too much, such 'probability' picking such a biased sample witht he assumption of h0 is low. that say, we have sufficient evidence to reject h0. such 'probability' given h0 is true and test it against the (biased) sample is p-value.

P-value 就係 assume null hypothesis is true 既時候
你個sample觀察到extreme case的probability
而alpha 係我地人為set既rejection region，通常為0.05
假設依家alpha係0.05，H0 is true, 如果係one tail test 的情況下。
咁我地一次性抽sample 只係得5% 會落係rejection region
如果發生咗呢D extreme case，通常我地會覺得好小機會會發生呢種事情，但咁好彩都被我地撞中咗， 所以要reject H0

所以如果P < alpha ，即係話我地sample 觀察到個result比我地set既reject region 更加極端更加罕有，我地越有信心去reject H0。
